mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.nickname, m.gender, m.birth_date, m.introduction, m.manner_temperature, m.profile_image_url FROM meeting_participation_history p JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id JOIN user u ON m.member_id = u.user_id WHERE p.meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND p.status_id = 2 AND u.status_id != 4

SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId, u.nickname AS leaderNickname, p.place_name AS placeName, p.address AS placeAddress, s.sport_name AS sportName, m.status_id AS statusId, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.date, m.start_time AS startTime, m.end_time AS endTime, m.min_user AS minUser, m.max_user AS maxUser, m.gender, m.age_group AS ageGroup, m.level, m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_participation_history ph ON m.meeting_id = ph.meeting_id JOIN member u ON m.leader_id = u.member_id LEFT JOIN place p ON m.place_id = p.place_id JOIN sport_type s ON m.sport_id = s.sport_id WHERE ph.member_id = #{userId} AND ph.status_id = 2

SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId, u.nickname AS leaderNickname, p.place_name AS placeName, p.address AS placeAddress, s.sport_name AS sportName, m.status_id AS statusId, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.date, m.start_time AS startTime, m.end_time AS endTime, m.min_user AS minUser, m.max_user AS maxUser, m.gender, m.age_group AS ageGroup, m.level, m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_participation_history ph ON m.meeting_id = ph.meeting_id JOIN member u ON m.leader_id = u.member_id LEFT JOIN place p ON m.place_id = p.place_id JOIN sport_type s ON m.sport_id = s.sport_id WHERE ph.member_id = #{userId} AND m.date < #{now}

SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId, mem.nickname AS leaderNickname, p.place_name AS placeName, p.address AS placeAddress, s.sport_name AS sportName, m.status_id AS statusId, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.date, m.start_time AS startTime, m.end_time AS endTime, m.min_user AS minUser, m.max_user AS maxUser, m.gender, m.age_group AS ageGroup, m.level, m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress FROM interested_meeting im JOIN meeting m ON im.meeting_id = m.meeting_id JOIN member mem ON m.leader_id = mem.member_id LEFT JOIN place p ON m.place_id = p.place_id JOIN sport_type s ON m.sport_id = s.sport_id WHERE im.member_id = #{userId} AND m.status_id != 4 ORDER BY m.date ASC, m.start_time ASC

SELECT b.member_id, b.gender, b.nickname, b.birth_date, b.introduction, b.manner_temperature, b.profile_image_url FROM meeting_participation_history a JOIN member b ON a.member_id = b.member_id JOIN user c ON b.member_id = c.user_id WHERE a.meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND a.status_id = 1 AND c.status_id != 4

SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId, u.nickname AS leaderNickname, p.place_name AS placeName, p.address AS placeAddress, s.sport_name AS sportName, m.status_id AS statusId, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.date, m.start_time AS startTime, m.end_time AS endTime, m.min_user AS minUser, m.max_user AS maxUser, m.gender, m.age_group AS ageGroup, m.level, m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_participation_history ph ON m.meeting_id = ph.meeting_id JOIN member u ON m.leader_id = u.member_id LEFT JOIN place p ON m.place_id = p.place_id JOIN sport_type s ON m.sport_id = s.sport_id WHERE ph.member_id = #{userId} AND ph.status_id = 1

SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId, u.nickname AS leaderNickname, p.place_name AS placeName, p.address AS placeAddress, s.sport_name AS sportName, m.status_id AS statusId, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.date, m.start_time AS startTime, m.end_time AS endTime, m.min_user AS minUser, m.max_user AS maxUser, m.gender, m.age_group AS ageGroup, m.level, m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress FROM meeting m JOIN member u ON m.leader_id = u.member_id LEFT JOIN place p ON m.place_id = p.place_id JOIN sport_type s ON m.sport_id = s.sport_id WHERE m.leader_id = #{userId}
